unnormalised: Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Virality Trends
normalised: social media and influencer marketing: virality trends

unnormalised: Hey there, trendspotters! What's going viral in India these days? Forget your morning chai – the real buzz is all about short-form video content. From hilarious recreations of classic Bollywood scenes to showcasing hidden talents, the 'gram and TikTok are buzzing.
normalised: hey there, trendspotters! what's going viral in india these days? forget your morning chai - the real buzz is all about short-form video content. from hilarious recreations of classic bollywood scenes to showcasing hidden talents, the 'gram and tiktok are buzzing.

unnormalised: Influencers like Prajakta Koli are setting the stage, moving beyond sponsored posts and really connecting with audiences through authentic, relatable content. Remember that "Rasode Mein Kaun Tha" meme from 2020? Virality can strike from anywhere!
normalised: influencers like prajakta koli are setting the stage, moving beyond sponsored posts and really connecting with audiences through authentic, relatable content. remember that "rasode mein kaun tha" meme from two thousand and twenty? virality can strike from anywhere!

unnormalised: We're seeing a massive shift towards regional content too. Creators from smaller towns are finding huge success by tapping into local languages and cultural nuances. Content about Durga Puja in Kolkata, or wedding shenanigans in Jaipur – it’s all clicking!
normalised: we're seeing a massive shift towards regional content too. creators from smaller towns are finding huge success by tapping into local languages and cultural nuances. content about durga puja in kolkata, or wedding shenanigans in jaipur - it's all clicking!

unnormalised: But remember, virality is a fickle mistress. What's trending at 09:30 hrs might be old news by 17:00 hrs on 10/11/2024. The key? Authenticity, relevance, and a little bit of luck. Keep experimenting, keep creating, and who knows? Maybe your content will be the next big thing to sweep the nation by 15/08/2025!
normalised: but remember, virality is a fickle mistress. what's trending at nine thirty hours might be old news by seventeen hundred hours on tenth november two thousand and twenty four. the key? authenticity, relevance, and a little bit of luck. keep experimenting, keep creating, and who knows? maybe your content will be the next big thing to sweep the nation by fifteenth august two thousand and twenty five!
